welcome.title: Welcome to the Site Interview
welcome.description: We'll ask you a few questions to better understand your website and business. This will help us provide personalized recommendations.

placeholders.enterKeyword: Enter a keyword and press Enter

messages.analyzing: Analyzing your website... This may take a moment.
messages.crawlComplete: I've analyzed your website! Here's what I found:
messages.crawlError: I couldn't access your website. Please check the URL and try again.
messages.foundKeywords: Found {count} keyword suggestions based on your website. Select the ones you want to target:
messages.findingCompetitors: Searching Google for competitors based on your keywords...

messages.generatingKeywords: Generating keyword suggestions from your website...
messages.noKeywordSuggestions: No keyword suggestions available. Please try again.

messages.languageDetected: We detected your website language as {language}
messages.internalLinksDefault: Based on your existing posts, we suggest {count} internal links per 1000 words

questions.welcome: 👋 Hi! I'm your Ghost AI Agent. I'll help you create a comprehensive SEO profile for your website.
questions.websiteUrl: Let's start - what's your website URL?
questions.businessType: What type of business do you run?
questions.primaryProducts: What are your main products or services? Describe what you offer to your customers.
questions.targetAudience: Who is your target audience? Tell me about their demographics, interests, and behaviors.
questions.mainKeywords: What are the main keywords you want to rank for? List 5-10 primary keywords related to your business.
questions.competitors: Who are your main competitors? Please provide 3-5 competitor website URLs.
questions.targetRegions: What geographic regions are you targeting?
questions.seoGoals: What are your primary SEO goals?
questions.currentTraffic: What's your current monthly organic traffic? (Approximate number is fine)
questions.contentTypes: What types of content do you currently publish?
questions.publishingFrequency: How often do you publish new content?
questions.toneVoice: What's your brand's tone and voice? (e.g., Professional, casual, friendly, authoritative, etc.)
questions.cmsplatform: What CMS platform do you use? (e.g., WordPress, Shopify, Wix, Custom, etc.)
questions.hostingProvider: Who is your hosting provider? (e.g., AWS, GoDaddy, Bluehost, etc.)
questions.hasExistingContent: Do you have existing content on your website?
questions.brandVoice: Let's define your brand voice. Based on your business, I'll suggest a tone and style for your content.
questions.reviewSummary: Here's a summary of your responses. Please review and make any changes if needed.
questions.complete: 🎉 Excellent! I've collected all the information I need. Your personalized SEO strategy is ready!
